content: Youngjin KwonSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYoungjin Kwon is an Associate Professor in the school of computing at KAIST and a member of Computer Architecture and Systems Lab  (CASYS)He won best paper awards at ACM SOSP'24, SOSP'21 and USENIX ATC'18. Also, he is a recipient of KAIST's EWON Endowed Chair Professor (2021), Soo-Young Lee Teaching Innovation Award (2021), KAIST breakthrough (2023, 2025), Technology Innovation Award (2023), Selection of KAIST Research Achievements (2024), Google Research Scholar Award (2025).Email: yjkwon at kaist.ac.kr[google scholar] [dblp] [linkedin] 2025 겨울학기 인턴십 공지 (Written in Korean)I am always looking for talented graduate students.
